summary: Alternative face for Faendal of Riverwood.
descriptionHtml:
[color=orange]_________________[/color]
[color=#6aa84f][b]FAENDAL FACELIFT[/b][/color]
Alternative face for Faendal of Riverwood.

[color=orange]____________[/color]
[color=#6aa84f][b]Requirement[/b][/color]s
No other mods required.

[color=orange]_______[/color]
[color=#6aa84f][b]INSTALL[/b][/color]
Install with NMM.
Sort load order with LOOT.

[color=orange]_____________________________________[/color]
[color=#6aa84f][b]ETHEREAL ELVEN OVERHAUL Compatibility[/b][/color]
This mod is compatible with EEO, just install this mod AFTER eeo and allow overwrite, then force Feandal facelift to load over/after eeo.
It will work because if the other mod uses loose files, this mod will overwrite. If the othe mod uses a bsa, my loose files will override the bsa.
Just make sure load order is correct.

[color=orange]_____________[/color]
[color=#6aa84f][b]Dark Face bug? Conflicts?[/b][/color]
This is a very simple mod and 99.9% of issues can be corrected by sorting your load order properly.
If Faendals face doesnt look right/darker or has no warpaint simply use LOOT to sort your load order.
If problems persist force this mod to load after any other mods affecting Faendal [i]in any way[/i], you can use tes5edit to check for conflicts.


[color=#e69138]If you liked this mod check out my[/color] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8331]Mjoll[/url] [color=#e69138]and[/color] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9425]Aela[/url] [color=#e69138]facelifts[/color]!

I also highly recommend the awesome facelifts by [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21576]sumojellybeans[/url] and [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16000]83willows[/url] (Get sumojellybeans Mjoll, not mine... her's is amazing :D ).

[color=#e69138]Enjoy! And please dont forget to endorse if you like him![/color]
author: Axeface
